title: Britain's Got Talent The Champions winner is a shock: Simon Cowell's warning
text:
Sorry, this video isn't available any more.

Simon Cowell has warned Britain’s Got Talent: the Champions fans that they’re in for a huge shock when the winner is announced later this month.

The music mogul, who claims to be 59-year-old but failed a lie detector test this week when asked about his age, treated fans to a second series of Britain’s Got Talent in 2019 with an all-star edition of the show which has been filmed, wrapped up and the actual champions of champions is already out there.

In turn, for the first time Simon knows who has landed the £100,000 prize before the rest of us.

Naturally, he’s not slipping but he did reveal to ex-girlfriend Terri Seymour during today’s Lorraine: ‘There is no way I’m going to tell you. The winner is a bit of a surprise, but at the same time you go, that act did deserve to win, 100 percent.’

So far Britain’s Got Talent: The Champions has been packed with major upsets. Not a single Britain’s Got Talent winner has made it through to the grand finale, with Paul Potts, Richard Jones and Lost Voice Guy all losing out on the ‘superfan’ vote.

Simon Cowell warned Britain’s Got Talent The Champions fans are in for a shock (Picture: ITV)

So far BGT: The Champions has been full of massive upsets (Picture: ITV)

Although, the eventual champ was leaked onto social media after they ended up celebrating with their trophy, which is understandable after mopping up a six-figure lump sum.

Simon also shed some light on the upcoming Celebrity X Factor, which has been shrouded in secrecy since the father to dance superstar Eric Cowell revealed he was scrapping The X Factor as we know it.

‘I thought [the celebrities] really did a good job, I think the show’s fun,’ he teased.

‘Sometimes I think change is fun and I think the people are interesting. I don’t want to give it away. They all do really want to win.’

So far the likes of Brendan Cole, Ben Cohen, a Love Island supergroup and The Chase star Jenny Ryan are all thought to be taking part
